page.title: 14 A day in my life by Gary
page.content: When I get up at 7 o' clock I get dressed and then have my breakfast which is usually Cornflakes. I see my Dad off to work and then feed my rabbits. Then I go indoors and play with my computer games. My Mum drives me to school and we play for about 10 minutes in the playground. We come into school at 8:50 a.m. and Mr Patrick collects our dinner money which costs 62p each day. Our lessons in the morning are usually reading, number work, singing, swimming and some topic work. Playtime lasts for 15 minutes and lunch-time is at noon.In the afternoon we paint or do needlework, sometimes games or P.E. and listen to stories. When I get home I have tea, play outside, watch T.V. and go to bed at 9 o' clock.
